title: Busted
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Weed, dope, kush, reefer -- whatever you call it, marijuana is quickly becoming legal across the country. It's also bringing people together, on Reddit.

media:content.media:description: Johnny Grandizio, left, and Officer Bob Winterstein, in 1975, in Huntington Beach, California. Winterstein arrested Grandizio for that enormous marijuana plant, but the charges were later dropped. (Family Photo)
